InstallOptions.body:
# Scaffolding by https://atom.io/packages/language-nsis

# Settings ---------------------------------
Name "${1:installer_name}"
OutFile "${2:${1:installer_name}}.exe"
RequestExecutionLevel ${3:admin}
Unicode true
InstallDir "\$PROGRAMFILES\\${4:${1:installer_name}}"

# Includes ---------------------------------
ReserveFile "\${NSISDIR}\\Plugins\\InstallOptions.dll"
ReserveFile "${5:\${NSISDIR\}\\Examples\\InstallOptions\\test}.ini"

# Pages ------------------------------------
Page custom "${6:iopage}" "${7:${6:iopage}_validation}" ": ${8:iopage_caption}"
Page components
Page directory
Page instfiles


# Sections ---------------------------------
Section "${11:section_name}" ${12:section_index}

	${13:# your code here}

SectionEnd

# Functions --------------------------------
Function .onInit

	InitPluginsDir
	File "/oname=\$PLUGINSDIR\\${9:ioFile}.ini" "${5:\${NSISDIR\}\\Examples\\InstallOptions\\test}.ini"

FunctionEnd

Function "${6:iopage}"

	Push \$R0
	InstallOptions::dialog "\$PLUGINSDIR\\${9:ioFile}.ini"
	Pop \$R0

FunctionEnd

Function "${7:${6:iopage}_validation}"

	${10:# your code here}

FunctionEnd$14
InstallOptions.description: Creates an installer template with InstallOptions support
